quote: Jesus calls us to his rest, and meekness is His method. The meek man cares not at all who is greater than he, for he has long ago decided that the esteem of the world is not worth the effort.
quote_letters: JESUS CALLS US TO HIS REST AND MEEKNESS IS HIS METHOD THE MEEK MAN CARES NOT AT ALL WHO IS GREATER THAN HE FOR HE HAS LONG AGO DECIDED THAT THE ESTEEM OF THE WORLD IS NOT WORTH THE EFFORT
